items.title: Official fall Prime Day PS5 game deals now live at up to 57% off: Death Stranding 2 all-time low, Spider-Man 2, TLOU, Demon’s Souls, more
items.summary:
While Amazon’s early Prime Big Deal Days sale is now live, with Target officially launching its competitor sale today many of the best PlayStation 5 game deals are already live. Amazon is now offering the best price yet on the weird and wonderful Death Stranding 2: On The Beach alongside price drops on a host of first-party PS5 titles like Marvel’s Spider-Man 2, The Last of Us titles, Gran Turismo 7, Demon’s Souls, Rise of the Ronin, and more. You’re looking at up to 57% off and you’ll find some highlights detailed below:

  • Death Stranding 2: On The Beach $50 (Reg. $70)
  • Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 $40 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part I $30 (Reg. $70)
  • The Last of Us Part II Remastered $30 (Reg. $50)
  • Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart $30 (Reg. $70)
  • MLB The Show 25 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Gran Turismo 7 $30 (Reg. $70)
  • God of War Ragnarök $30 (Reg. $70)
  • LEGO Horizon Adventures $20 (Reg. $60)
  • Demon’s Souls $30 (Reg. $70)
  • Rise of the Ronin $40 (Reg. $70)
  • And even more…

Many of these deals are also live as part of the Target Circle Week sale as well – be sure to create/sign in to a FREE Circle account first.

more…

While the Series 11 model has arrived, and there are some light launch deals live right now, you can now land Apple Watch Series 10 starting from $239.99 shipped for the 42mm and down at $257.99 for the 46mm model.  You’ll need to be signed in to a FREE Target Circle account to redeem these prices.
